      • register

        public String register(Schema schema,
                       String overrideName)
                throws SchemaRegistryException
        Register a schema to the Kafka schema registry under the provided input name. This method will change the name of the schema to the provided name. This is useful because certain services (like Gobblin kafka adaptor and Camus) get the schema for a topic by querying for the latest schema with the topic name, requiring the topic name and schema name to match for all topics. This method registers the schema to the schema registry in such a way that any schema can be written to any topic.
        Specified by:
        register in class KafkaSchemaRegistry<String,Schema>
        Parameters:
        schema - Schema to register.
        overrideName - Name of the schema when registerd to the schema registry. This name should match the name of the topic where instances will be published.
        Returns:
        schema ID of the registered schema.
        Throws:
        SchemaRegistryException - if registration failed

      • register

        public String register(Schema schema)
                throws SchemaRegistryException
        Register a schema to the Kafka schema registry
        Specified by:
